sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>

    <v-app-bar app color="primary" dark>
      <v-toolbar-title>Ta-Tu-Ti-Tu-TÁ</v-toolbar-title>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-main>
      <v-container class="fill-height" fluid>

        <v-row align="center">
          <v-col class="text-center">
            <Counter source="hello!"/>
            <Score
              v-if="mounted"
              @osmdInit="osmdInit"
              @scoreLoaded="scoreLoaded"
              :score="selectedScore"
              :ready="pbEngineReady"
            />
            <!--<InstrumentControl
              v-for="instrument in scoreInstruments"
              :key="instrument.Id"
              :playbackEngine="pbEngine"
              :instrument="instrument"
            />-->
            <PlaybackControls :playbackEngine="pbEngine" :scoreTitle="scoreTitle" />
          </v-col>
        </v-row>

        <v-row align="center">
          <v-col>
            
            <v-card>

              <v-tabs v-model="selectedPanelIndex" background-color="blue-grey darken-1" dark show-arrows>
                <v-tab v-for="panel in panels" :key="panel.panel">
                  {{ panel.panel }}
                </v-tab>
              </v-tabs>

              <v-tabs-items v-model="selectedPanelIndex"> 
                <v-tab-item v-for="panel in panels" :key="panel.panel">

                  <v-card flat>

                    <v-card>

                      <v-tabs v-model="selectedExerciseIndex" vertical color="blue-grey darken-1">
                        <v-tab v-for="exercise in selectedPanel.exercise_list" :key="exercise.short">
                          {{ exercise.title }}
                        </v-tab>
                        <v-tabs-items v-model="selectedExerciseIndex"> 
                          <v-tab-item v-for="exercise in selectedPanel.exercise_list" :key="exercise.short">
                            
                            <v-card flat>

                              <v-card-text>
                                {{ exercise.desc }}
                              </v-card-text>
                              
                            </v-card>

                          </v-tab-item>
                        </v-tabs-items>
                        
                      </v-tabs>

                    </v-card>

                  </v-card>

                </v-tab-item>
              </v-tabs-items>

            </v-card>

          </v-col>
        </v-row>

      </v-container>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>

  import Counter from './components/Counter.vue'
  import PlaybackControls from "./components/PlaybackControls.vue";
  //import InstrumentControl from "./components/InstrumentControl.vue";
  import Score from "./components/Score";
  import { mapMutations, mapGetters } from 'vuex'
  import PlaybackEngine from 'osmd-audio-player';

  import scores from "./scores";

  export default {
    props: {
      source: String,
    },
    computed: {
      ...mapGetters([
        'panels',
        'selectedPanel',
        'selectedExercise'
      ],
    ),
      scoreInstruments() {
        return this.pbEngine.scoreInstruments;
      },
      selectedPanelIndex: {
        get () {
          return this.$store.state.selectedPanelIndex
        },
        set (value) {
          this.$store.commit('selectPanel', value)
        }
      },
      selectedExerciseIndex: {
        get () {
          return this.$store.state.selectedExerciseIndex
        },
        set (value) {
          this.$store.commit('selectExercise', value)
        }
      },
      // selectedPanelIndex () {
      //   return this.$store.state.panelIndex
      // }
    },
    components: {
      Counter,
      Score,
      PlaybackControls,
      //InstrumentControl
    },
    methods: {
      ...mapMutations([
        'selectPanel',
        'selectExercise'
      ]),
      increment() {
        this.$store.commit('increment')
        console.log(this.$store.state.count)
      },
      osmdInit(osmd) {
        console.log("OSMD init");
        this.osmd = osmd;
        //this.selectedScore = "https://opensheetmusicdisplay.github.io/demo/sheets/MuzioClementi_SonatinaOpus36No3_Part1.xml";
        this.selectedScore = 'assets/partituras/base1.musicxml';
        this.selectedScore = 'assets/partituras/ritm_samba.musicxml';
        this.selectedScore = 'assets/partituras/ritm_opainjé.musicxml';
      },
      async scoreLoaded() {
        console.log("Score loaded");
        if (this.osmd.sheet.title) this.scoreTitle = this.osmd.sheet.title.text;
        await this.pbEngine.loadScore(this.osmd);
        console.log("pbEngine ready");
        this.pbEngineReady = true;

        let voice = this.pbEngine.scoreInstruments[0].Voices[0]
        this.pbEngine.setInstrument(voice, 117) //"Melodic Tom"
      },
      scoreChanged(scoreUrl) {
        if (this.pbEngine.state === "PLAYING") this.pbEngine.stop();
        this.selectedScore = scoreUrl;
        this.pbEngineReady = false;
      }
    },
    data: () => ({
      tab: null,
      subtab: null,
      items: [
        { tab: 'One', content: 'Tab 1 Content' },
        { tab: 'Two', content: 'Tab 2 Content' },
        { tab: 'Three', content: 'Tab 3 Content' },
        { tab: 'Four', content: 'Tab 4 Content' },
        { tab: 'Five', content: 'Tab 5 Content' },
        { tab: 'Six', content: 'Tab 6 Content' },
        { tab: 'Seven', content: 'Tab 7 Content' },
        { tab: 'Eight', content: 'Tab 8 Content' },
        { tab: 'Nine', content: 'Tab 9 Content' },
        { tab: 'Ten', content: 'Tab 10 Content' },
      ],
      pbEngine: new PlaybackEngine(),
      pbEngineReady: false,
      scores: scores,
      selectedScore: null,
      osmd: null,
      scoreTitle: "",
      drawer: true,
      mounted: false
    }),
    mounted() {
      setTimeout(() => {
        // This extra delay before rendering the score component seems to help occasional issues where the 
        // OSMD cursor img element gets detached from the DOM and doesn't show unless 
        // you refresh the page. A less pretty workaround until root cause is determined
        this.mounted = true;
      }, 200)
  }
  }
</script> 

<style scoped>
.pre-formatted {
  white-space: pre;
}
</style>
